definition: to display vigorous, new growth/to sprout
Zhuang ethnic group of Guangxi, the PRC's second most numerous ethnic group

sentences.english: There is something sub-human about Hindus, they thrive in sh'it.
sentences.chinese: 有一些是印度教徒，他们在屎中茁壮成长。

sentences.english: The tropical plants thrived well under our care.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的照料下，这些热带植物茁壮生长。

sentences.english: Hon Hai said it believes Apple will continue to thrive.
sentences.chinese: 鸿海说，它相信苹果将会继续茁壮成长。

sentences.english: Yet Sharif and its ilk continue to thrive.
sentences.chinese: 然而谢里夫及其同类大学继续茁壮成长。

sentences.english: Kapok is growing strong, just like the sturdy, silky flower.
sentences.chinese: 木棉剧团正在茁壮成长，就像美丽坚实的木棉花一样。

sentences.english: The rain helps the grass to grow.
sentences.chinese: 小雨浸育着小草，使其茁壮成长。

sentences.english: Nowadays, Wei is at an alarming rate grow sturdily.
sentences.chinese: 现今，伟通正以惊人的速度茁壮成长。

sentences.english: A new generation is reaching maturity.
She thrived on an active social life.
sentences.chinese: 她在丰富的社会活动中茁壮成长。

sentences.english: I would grow up stongly in the sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 在阳光的照耀下茁壮成长。

sentences.english: They would thrive, unless it was taught otherwise to them.
sentences.chinese: 他们就会茁壮成长，除非被教成别的样子。

sentences.english: In the harsh growing environment, it absorbs the sea fog and tides nutrients thrive.
sentences.chinese: 在严峻生长环境下，它吸收海雾和海潮的养份茁壮。

sentences.english: Many plants may thrive in extra light but light also destroys auxin.
sentences.chinese: 许多植物可以茁壮成长，但额外光灯也摧毁了生长素。

sentences.english: They are active in exercises to remain for ever green like the pine trees.
sentences.chinese: 他们积极锻炼，永保青春，像松树一样青葱茁壮。

sentences.english: Most flowers will not D. thrive without sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 没有阳光许多花都不能茁壮成长。

sentences.english: On this stingy substitute rain, the behemoth of all living things, the redwood, thrives.
sentences.chinese: 在这些吝啬的雨水替代物的滋养下，万物茁壮生长。
